DOC.brief_summary: Nephrology participation in care of patients undergoing CABG could reduce AKI through correction of modifiable risk factors and early detection and intervention of post-op AKI.
DOC.brief_title: Prevention and Early Detection and Intervention of Post-Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting Surgery (CABG) Acute Kidney Injury (AKI)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients (Age >18 years) Elective CABG at Mayo Clinic Rochester and Shanghai Zhongshan Hospital from 7/1/2016 to 6/30/2017 Nonelective CABG Renal failure on dialysis Renal transplantation
